body: So apparently a Florida state congressman believes that Donald Trump’s candidacy is secretly a Democratic plot.  If true, it’s a pretty ingenious scheme. Trump is not only the candidate with the most Republicans saying he’s their preferred presidential nominee …     … he also has a higher favorability rating than half of the party’s current (or expected) contenders.    Source: YouGov/The Economist poll, conducted July 4-6, 2015.    To be fair he also has a higher unfavorability rating than every other Republican contender, but I guess that’s the price of being bold.
description: Did sneaky Democrats conspire to find a Republican candidate who would be better liked than the rest of the GOP field?
title: Donald Trump, Democratic conspiracy candidate
